Bio

Hi, I am a Software Engineer who loves to solve problems and build things that makes a difference. Currently, I work at Adrosonic as a Research & Innovation Engineer, developing Intelligent Automation and Generative AI solutions leveraging tools like Python, React, OpenAI, UiPath, and Power Platform. I'm passionate about designing Full Stack solutions and love experimenting with various technologies like React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, GO, and C++ among others. Always excited to explore new technologies and build cool projects along the way! If you'd like to chat, reach out to me on LinkedIn or drop an email.
